author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Beijing Forever Technology to pay A shares div for FY 2017 on April 19
text:
April 13 (Reuters) - Beijing Forever Technology Co Ltd :
* Says it will pay cash dividend of 2 yuan(before tax)/10 shares for 2017 to shareholders of record on April 18
* The companyâ€™s shares will be traded ex-right and ex-dividend on April 19 and the dividend will be paid on April 19
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/1bTnKN
